effect.name: TAP Reverberator
effect.description:
TAP Reverberator (LADSPA 2142)
Versatile reverb filter based on the comb/allpass filter model. For recommended decay times for reverb types refer to the effect documentation linked below.
effect.author: http://www.ladspa.org

parameter.name: Reverb Type
parameter.comment:
HD stands for High Density.
Reverb types with HD are enhanced versions of the other types and usually result in an even smoother reverb effect.
parameter.paramlistdisplay: AfterBurn,AfterBurn (Long),Ambience,Ambience (Thick),Ambience (Thick) - HD,Cathedral,Cathedral - HD,Drum Chamber,Garage,Garage (Bright),Gymnasium,Gymnasium (Bright),Gymnasium (Bright) - HD,Hall (Small),Hall (Medium),Hall (Large),Hall (Large) - HD,Plate (Small),Plate (Medium),Plate (Large),Plate (Large) - HD,Pulse Chamber,Pulse Chamber (Reverse),Resonator (96 ms),Resonator (152 ms),Resonator (208 ms),Room (Small),Room (Medium),Room (Large),Room (Large) - HD,Slap Chamber,Slap Chamber - HD,Slap Chamber (Bright),Slap Chamber (Bright) - HD,Smooth Hall (Small),Smooth Hall (Medium),Smooth Hall (Large),Smooth Hall (Large) - HD,Vocal Plate,Vocal Plate - HD,Warble Chamber,Warehouse,Warehouse - HD
